title: Invariant part of class group and distribution of relative class group
abstract:
We generalize the work of Roquette and Zassenhaus on the invariant part of
the class groups to the relative class groups. Thereby, we can show some
statistical results as follows. For abelian extensions over a fixed number
field K, we show infinite Cp-moments for the Sylow p-subgroup of the relative
class group when p divides the degree of the extension. For sextic number
fields with A4-closure, we can show infinite C2-moments for the Sylow
2-subgroup of the relative class group when the extensions run over a fixed
Galois cubic field.
